mainDescription: During the challenging pandemic era marked by lockdowns, I made a conscious decision to let go of one unproductive hobby and embraced reading, which has had a profound impact on my life and significantly expanded my knowledge base.

topBooks.title: Top books I read so far

extremeOwnership.title: Extreme Ownership
extremeOwnership.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
extremeOwnership.lessonLearned: This book explores the application of military tactics in the business world and our daily lives. It taught me the importance of taking responsibility for my mistakes, rather than placing blame on others. It highlights the leader's role in guiding the team towards the right direction. Ultimately, it empowered me to take ownership of my life's circumstances.

definingDecade.title: The Defining Decade
definingDecade.author: Meg Jay, PHD
definingDecade.lessonLearned: This book enlightened me about the importance of my twenties and the long-term impact of my choices during this period, throughout my thirties and beyond. It motivated me to break free from bad habits, such as excessive social media scrolling, which can consume hours of my day. My twenties emerged as a crucial decade for personal growth and self-development.

fictions.title: Fiction Books
books: Harry Potter (The Whole Series) by J.K. Rowling

nonFictions.title: Non-Fictions
books: Rich Dad Poor Dad by Robert Kiyosaki
